sentences.sentence: Brazil has officially recognized 1,200 square kilometers of indigenous land. A move headed by President Luis Ignacio Lula da Silva that's meant to protect forests from the exploitation that marked his predecessors administration. The land will remain under federal jurisdiction but indigenous people will have the right to use it. Mining activities will be prohibited in the region and non-indigenous people will be forbidden from engaging in economic activity on the land.
